agentCard.name: Environment Isolation Agent
agentCard.description: Comprehensive environment isolation system that replaces global os.environ copying with explicit, secure context passing. Provides plugin isolation, containerization support, audit trails, and prevents cross-plugin environment contamination for enterprise-grade security.
